properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 10:02PM EST until January 5 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS DEVELOPING TOMORROW MORNING AND
CONTINUING INTO THIS WEEKEND...

.A strong cold front will approach the region Friday night and
pass through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to
30 knots on Friday, becoming west to northwest and increasing to
30 to 40 knots behind the front Saturday night into Sunday
morning.

* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and seas
7 to 10 feet expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Surf City.

* WHEN...From 3 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY
